id: Demolition of porch and part of dwelling, alterations including the removal of the chimney stacks and upgrading external facing materials, erection of part ground/first floor two storey front extension with accommodation in the roof space and enlargement of roof to the existing ground floor element at side fronting Woodfield Hill
Hip to gable roof extension including new dormer and photovoltaic panel.

1, Common Oak - To raise low hanging branches to clear building roofs by 2m, not including primary branches. 8, Gleditsia Sunburst - To raise low canopy to 2m. 9, Norway Spruce - To raise low hanging branches to clear boundary fence. 10, Common Oak - To remove trunk epicormic shoots to 4m height to clear shed/summer house. 11, Lawson Cypress 'stewarti' - To trim to a compact form. 13, Common Ash - To Fell. 15, Common Hawthorn - To raise low branches to 1.8m height. 18, Norway Maple - To remove squirrel damaged Branches and raise low canopy to 2.5m. 20, Silver Birch - To remove SW primary branch growing towards gate, with impact damage to underside of branch at 3.5m height and raise low canopy to 3m. 21, Common Hawthorn - To reduce crown height by 1.5 - 2m and spread by 1m. 22, Common Hawthorn - To reduce crown height and spread by 2m. 23a, Olive - To lightly trim. 23b, Olive - To lightly trim.

id: Erection of single storey side extension for use as a granny annexe, alterations to land levels/extension of existing retaining wall to form extended patio area
